section.title: What is it
section.p: This Xholon application is a reimplementation of the "Spring Idol" contest as described and implemented in the book: Walls, Craig. (2008). Spring in Action, 2nd edition. Greenwich, CT: Manning. See especially pages 40-70 in the book. The intent of implementing this application in Xholon is to demonstrate and experiment with the similarities between the Spring and Xholon frameworks.
Spring is a popular open-source application framework.

section.title: How to use it

ol.li: Run the Java application through the Xhn GUI (org.primordion.xholon.app.Xhn.java), and select File --> Open --> Spring --> SpringIdol --> SpringIdol_xhn.xml.
Expand the Controller node in the tree.
